channel.title: Senses on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Senses on Docs

item.title: The 5 most obvious phenomena of aging in a poodle are the ones that owners need to take care of, and they can give it a few more years of life!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Dogs, no matter how cute they are, will one day grow old, and pet owners should not let go. However, if you can change the pace of your dog’s life as soon as you see him getting older, you’ll be able to keep him alive for a long time. If you have a poodle, how can you tell if your poodle is getting old? Let’s tell you about it here, so that you can pay attention to it.
